Content: With the dawn of the year 2018, triplets have been born at Dambulla Base Hospital. The mother, who also has a 5-year-old boy, is from the Aravula area in Dambulla. The triplets, all are girls, are in a healthy condition, the doctors said. The mother said that her husband is working in a lorry in Colombo and they are faced with financial difficulties to look after their children now.
